# Qualcomm

## Qualcomm Snapdragon chips

Most modern qualcomm SoC have the wireless and bluetooth in the same chip (different CPU/MCU cores depending on the chip family).

---

### [Write Controller RAM](../type/Write_RAM.md)


| Functionality | OCF   | Address to write (4 bytes) | Data to write (variable: 1-251 bytes)|
| --- | --- | --- | --- |  --- |
| Write RAM (`"Write_RAM"`) | 0x |   =   | Byte description | 

Scapy definition:

```
example
```
